document.full_text: the united nations security council expressed 'indignation' at an attack that killed 30 civilians in ivory coast, and pledged the crime 'shall not remain unpunished.'
document.title: africa: ivory coast: security council denounces attack on civilians
lines_and_colors: the united nations security council expressed 'indignation' at an attack that killed 30 civilians in ivory coast, and pledged the crime 'shall not remain unpunished.'
